title: Kuo: AirPods Pro With USB-C Charging Case to Launch Later This Year
content:
Apple plans to release second-generation AirPods Pro with a USB-C charging case later this year, with mass shipments expected to begin in the second to third quarter, according to information shared today by Apple industry analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.


The second-generation AirPods Pro were released in September 2022 and have a Lightning connector on the charging case. It's unclear if the new version of the second-generation AirPods Pro will have any other changes beyond the USB-C port on the charging case.

In a tweet, Kuo added that Apple currently has no plans to release USB-C versions of the second-generation or third-generation standard AirPods.
